thread.title: Emma Stone went country in this sueded dress that looks perfect for twirling
thread.title_full: Emma Stone went country in this sueded dress that looks perfect for twirling

author: Emily Baines
title: Emma Stone went country in this sueded dress that looks perfect for twirling
text:
Emma Stone went country in this sueded dress that looks perfect for twirling One of the starlet names everyone’s talking about is Emma Stone, who amazed all of us with her head-turning performance in La La Land . So of course she’s making all the appearances at award shows. Emma Stone dazzled at the AFI Awards wearing a suede dress by The Row. No surprise there, she has crushed it fashion-wise this season. And even though her ex-boyfriend Andrew Garfield was at the AFI Awards, the exes acted perfectly polite . Not only is she fashionable, she’s classy as all heck.
Look at Emma Stone’s latest red carpet look! Kevin Winter / Getty Images We absolutely adore how poised yet comfortable she appears. Plus her scarlet red toes are absolutely gorgeous. We love her minimalist makeup, as well.
Steve Granitz/WireImage/Getty Images Emma Stone isn’t afraid to take fashion risks As she told The Stylist ,
“That old question about whether, as a woman, you can be funny and attractive at the same time. Argh! I hate that question. Of course you can. But this idea that you have to choose between the two does persist, and I think a lot of female actors have a real fear of not looking their best. They learn to prize their vanity over a role in which they have to look like a moron. They’re worried they’ll damage their sex appeal. Thankfully, I have no problem looking like a moron!” We can’t wait to see what Emma Stone wears next!
